DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , single dose , crossover study compare pharmacokinetic characteristic co-administration metformin SR rosuvastatin JLP-1310 healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: The PK Characteristics Co-administration Metformin SR Rosuvastatin JLP-1310 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , single dose , crossover clinical trial
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer , age 19 year Body weight 55kg , The result Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less 17.5 kg/m2 , 30.5 kg/m2 Subject ability comprehend study objective , content property study drug participate trial Subject ability willingness participate whole period trial Presence medical history concurrent disease may interfere treatment safety assessment completion clinical study , include clinically significant disorder kidney , liver , cardiovascular system , respiratory system , endocrine system , neuropsychiatric system . Subjects allergic investigational drug . Subjects medical history affect clinical trial . Systolic BP > 140mmHG Diastolic BP > 90mmHg ) AST ALT > X 2 UNL History drug abuse positive drug screening . Participation drug study within 3 month prior drug administration . Whole blood donation within 60 day , blood component donation within 30 day get transfusion within 30days .
